message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $150 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
